requestinformation.code: The response code is a 3 digit number used to indicate the status of the request. Please refer to the attached documentation for a list of codes.
requestinformation.codemessage: The response message for the response code.

inputs.firstname: The enterted first name of the subject
inputs.lastname: The enterted last name of the subject

dob.year: The entered birth year of the subject
dob.month: The entered birth month of the subject
dob.day: The enterted birth day of the subject

inputs.ssn: The entered ssn of the subject
inputs.endusercode: The identity of the end user.
inputs.enduserstate: The state in which the end user is working.
inputs.reportusestate: The state in which the report will be used.
inputs.permissiblepurpose: The reason for which the report has been requested.
inputs.version: The version of the XML Gateway that is being run: 2.0
inputs.product: The product that is being requested: AIM
inputs.quoteback: The value of the quoteback input

ssn-validation.message: SSN validation message and the place SSN is issued

record.death-verification-code: Returns a P or a V indicating the manner of confirmation of death (Proof or Verified).

date-first.year: The first known year at the specified address
date-first.month: The first known month at the specified address

date-last.year: The last known year at the specified address
date-last.month: The last known month at the specified address
